citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
2 goats and 4 cows were observed to have severely overgrown hooves, and had not been reported to the attending
veterinarian for guidance. Overgrown hooves may limit mobility, impede normal herd behavior and interaction, and
present a risk for injury. The facility must ensure that all problems of animal health are conveyed to the veterinarian in a
timely manner.
Correct from February 8, 2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.33(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
2 goats and 4 cows were observed to have severely overgrown hooves, and had not been reported to the attending 
veterinarian for guidance. Overgrown hooves may limit mobility, impede normal herd behavior and interaction, and 
present a risk for injury. The facility must ensure that all problems of animal health are conveyed to the veterinarian in a 
timely manner. 
 
Correct from February 8, 2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
